text: Tichu inmani ngaihi Pathian mi ngai in-eii, ama'n inmani hi asa sik-ah abool halli ama lurlianna kha inmani diang amalar, inmani diang ama inzootna chong9:4: inzootna chong; larik lekkhat achu chonginkhitna inhap. kha abool, halli Dan kha inmani diang apeii, inmani diang kadik chubei kha aom, halli inmani'n akadik Pathian chong inkhitna ngaikha inmu, Suok 4:22
